sentence.Network_en: There are calls for more punitive measures against people who drink and drive.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人呼吁对酒后驾车的人要有更具处罚性的措施。

sentence.Network_en: They took punitive measures against the whole gang.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对整帮人采取惩罚性措施.

sentence.Network_en: He said companies should face punitive civil penalties running into millions of pounds.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说公司应该面临高达几百万英镑的惩罚性民事罚款。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French punitif, -ive or medieval Latin punitivus, from Latin punit- 'punished', from the verb punire (see punish)

entry.def: Punitive actions are intended to punish people.

example.ex: Other economists say any punitive measures against foreign companies would hurt US interests.
example.tran: 其他经济学家说任何针对外国公司的惩罚性措施都会损害美国的利益。

auth_sentence.content: Seeking alleviation from the punitive burden of the Revenue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Seeking alleviation from the punitive burden of the Revenue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seeking alleviation from the punitive burden of the Revenue.

auth_sentence.content: Why would they offer that opportunity just to be punitive?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why would they offer that opportunity just to be punitive?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why would they offer that opportunity just to be punitive?

auth_sentence.content: Lyrically, Junior is in punitive fettle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lyrically, Junior is in punitive fettle.

sentences.en: In response, Charles VI sent a punitive expedition to Brittany, raping and killing the populace.
sentences.cn: 作为报复，查理六世派军讨伐布列塔尼，奸淫杀戮平民。

sentences.en: The US could impose punitive tariffs of up to 100% on some countries’ exports.
sentences.cn: 美国可能会对某些国家的出口商品征收高达100% 的惩罚性关税。

sentences.en: They took punitive measures against the whole gang.
sentences.cn: 他们对整帮人采取惩罚性措施。
